resources.string:
In order to run correctly, ZapTorch needs to enable a system Accessibility Service. This service will monitor when you press the Volume Down key on your device. It will not monitor any other keys nor will it collect any user information.
\n\nPlease Enable ZapTorch in the System Accesibility Settings.

ZapTorch needs this to observe when you press the Volume Down key to turn on the flash light.
\n\nIt does not collect any information. It does not monitor anything else at all.
